1: Move blocks B1, B2 and B4 inside SA3.
2: Move green circle block B1 inside SA3.
3: Move green triangle block B4 inside pink special area SA1.
4: Move green circle block B2 inside pink special area SA2.
5: Move green triangle B1 inside special area SA3.
6: Move blue triangle B2 and pink triangle B1 inside pink special area SA3.
7: Move B1, B2 and B5 blocks inside SA2 so that all the blocks are inside SA2.
8: Move blue circle block B2 inside SA1.
9: Move green circle block B1 and green square block B3 inside SA1.
10: Move blue circle B2 inside SA2.
